endpoints: MPC Has an Extensive Suite of MLP-Qualifying Assets ~$1.4 Billion of Estimated Annual EBITDA  Equity in 50/50 blue water JV with Crowley  61 light product; ~20 MMBBL storage; 187 loading lanes  18 asphalt; ~4 MMBBL storage; 68 loading lanes  Utica investments (crude & condensate trucking and truck/barge terminals)  21 owned and 2,189 leased  793 general service; 1,102 high pressure; 315 open-top hoppers  59 MMBBL storage (tanks and caverns)  25 rail loading racks and 26 truck loading racks; 7 owned and 11 non-owned docks  2 condensate splitter investments  20 B gallons of fuels distribution volume at MPC/Speedway  Superior fuels distribution business model with no fuel inventory risk or working capital cost  Receives fixed service fee per gallon of fuel sold; not exposed to daily margin volatility  Captures entire margin from refinery gate to terminal  ~5,400 miles of additional pipelines (owns, leases or has an ownership interest) 13
